name: School Of Love: Clubs!
storyline: You are a high school student who didn't have chance to choose his own club. After finding yourself in a conflict between two different clubs, you are trying to prove yourself to others, make new friends and improve your relationships. But your adventure doesn't end there. There are a lot of mysteries waiting to be unveiled along the way.
summary: School Of Love: Clubs! is a high quality Dating Sim/Visual Novel game. There are so many things you can do in the game and many more such as easter eggs, secret objects, cards etc. This will be an amazing journey.
